metadata.synopsis: A female goblin grunt. Nervous and respectful to drow, insulting towards tieflings. World-weary and advisory to others.

0.speaker: Tracker Tozad
0.text: If yer plannin' to talk ta the drow, watch yerself - she's in a right mood.
0.context: NodeContext: Nervous and deferential (when speaking to a drow) Insulting (when speaking to a Tiefling)  Friendly word of advice (if speaking to neither a drow or tiefling).

1.speaker: Tracker Tozad
1.text: Look at this. Priestess Gut burned me good.
1.context: NodeContext: proudly showing off a mark on the back of her hand

2.speaker: Tracker Tozad
2.context: NodeContext: Nervous and deferential (when speaking to a drow) Insulting (when speaking to a Tiefling)  Friendly word of advice (if speaking to neither a drow or tiefling).
